Reviews.Title: i pay for a new blackberry 9810 and i got a refurished one .until now the phone is not working .
Reviews.Author: marcell  layne
Reviews.Content: i am very dissapointed with the phone .first the blackberry phone i bought was refurished ,and i pay for a new phone .i am so upset about buying this phone because i took it to my country guyana and i am back and until now that phone did not work ,the phone needs a new board the phone is terrible i am really sorry i bought it ,and it is a phone its has not black berry written on it  and it has white manual and i saw the orignal blackberry and it is a total big different ,from the one u guys sell to me .i will like to now what will happen i bought a new phone and has to fix it .it ia not fare someone please help.i am  telling everyone do not buy phones on lines no more the say their phone are new but they are not .

Reviews.Title: Some serious problem
Reviews.Author: Italo Poletti
Reviews.Content: The Blackberry Torch 9810 was sold as " new " , but it was not.  Scratches on both  Green / Red booting on the lower bar.The Battery inside scratched and rubbed . Removed the cover, on the left bottom screw inside the phone a sticker they apply as a seal to make sure nobody unscrew it again ( otherwise it brakes ).The phone itself works ok , the battery doesn't last much.Set aside , need a really new one.Currently waiting for the permission to return it , no answer / action since 10 days , but it's Christmass . . .

Reviews.Title: very bad
Reviews.Author: cpalmera
Reviews.Content: this very irresponsible storenot the product you buythe quality is far below my expectationsthe product is repaired

Reviews.Title: great phone bu blackberries are always full of problems
Reviews.Author: Harpreet S. Chawla
Reviews.Content: amazon does a great job connecting sellers but some how i am not happy with blackberry products.they need to work allotto satisfy their custumers.but its not this phone , this model has a problem globally .

Reviews.Title: All model but great
Reviews.Author: manuel
Reviews.Content: Work prefectly, with any phone company without any restriction, great cellphne, for a great price. Totally recommended, great value for a great product

Reviews.Title: Very happy.
Reviews.Author: N. Halfhide "sunny 1971"
Reviews.Content: My husband ordered this phone and the was a problem with what was available and what he ordered. However the vendor was wonderful as was the service and it was all sorted out quickly and efficiently. He is very happy with his purchase.

Reviews.Title: Regular
Reviews.Author: Maria O
Reviews.Content: La bateria o el pin de carga no me vinieron muy buenos! al principio se coloco una equis en el celular! tuve que comprar una bateria nueva! para solucionar el problema! Creo que vino dañada.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: Luis Mendez
Reviews.Content: Desde Venezuela confirmo que este producto es excelente. entregas eficaz. Muchas gracias.. espero volver a realizar compras a este vendedor.
